connect20/productiveminds_contactus.name: connect20/Productiveminds_Contactus

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/productiveminds_contactus.description: The extension opens up the standard Magento contact us page as an overlay, which gives your customers the ability to leave a message without browsing away from their current page.
